articleinfo.releaseinfo: This manual describes version 2.15.2 of Users Administration Tool.

legalnotice.title: Återkoppling

abstract.para: The Users Administration Tool allows you add, delete and modify the existing users and groups in your system.

sect1.title: Introduktion
sect1.para: The Users Administration Tool allows you add, delete and modify the existing users and groups in your system.

sect1.title: Komma igång
sect1.para: Du kan starta Användaradministrationsverktyg på följande sätt:
When you start Users Administration Tool, you will be prompted for the administrator password, this is necessary because the changes done with this tool will affect the whole system.
After entering the administrator password, the following window is displayed.
The Users Administration Tool main window contains the following elements:

listitem.para: Shows the available users. depending on the gconf key "/apps/gnome-system-tools/users/show_all" it will show the system users too.
Allows to add or delete users or modify user settings.
Shows a similar dialog to modify group settings.

sect2.title: För att lägga till en ny användare
sect2.para: Press the Add button in the main dialog, a new window will appear asking for the new user data. For adding a new user, you must provide at least the username and password (automatically generated or by hand). Optionally you can specify or modify real name, office location, work phone, home phone, main group, used shell, home directory, user ID and a list of the secondary groups for the user.
Main group, used shell, home directory and user ID are automatically guessed depending on the selected profile.

sect2.title: För att modifiera en existerande användare
sect2.para: Select the user you want to modify and press the Properties button, A window similar to the used for adding new users will appear with all the user data, allowing you to modify them.

sect2.title: För att ta bort en existerande användare
sect2.para: Select the user or users that you want to delete and press the Delete button in the Users tab, due to the importance of this data, you will be asked for confirmation for every user you want to delete.
For security reasons, the home directory of the deleted users will not be deleted.

sect2.title: För att lägga till en ny grupp
sect2.para: Press the Add button in the groups dialog, a new window will appear asking for the new group data. For adding a new group, you must provide at least the group name and the group ID. Optionally you can specify the users that will belong to this group.

sect2.title: För att modifiera en existerande grupp
sect2.para: Select the group you want to modify in the groups dialog and press the Properties button, A window will appear with the group's data allowing you to modify them.

sect2.title: För att ta bort en existerande grupp
sect2.para: Select the group or groups that you want to delete in the groups dialog and press the Delete button in the Groups tab, due to the importance of this data, you will be asked for confirmation for every group you want to delete.
